**Description:** 

With advanced clipping technologies implemented for maximum performance a pod racer can not get much better than this, highly maneuverable, extremely fast this pod racer simply has no match when it comes to performance. 

**Part count:** 217

**Cost:** 106,362

**Weight:** 17.5T

**Flight instruction:** 

It is said that it takes jedi like reflexes to control a pod racer.

**Action groups:** 

1: Toggle engines

2: Toggle air intake

Nah too heavy to make it hover with stock parts and i did not want to use any mods on it (That and with its TWR it would have flown anyway haha), check out this is podracing mk2 for 0.90 if you want a more authentic pod racer ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) it uses KAS and kerbal foundries wheels and repulsors.

> Nah too heavy to make it hover with stock parts

Dude use the stock hovering technique! Clip wheels into the two engines and the cockpit, place a flat part just under them and the whole thing will hover. Apparently it works even better now!

 Super cool craft by the way. Good job man.
